title: Impact of gadolinium-based MRI contrast agent and local anesthetics co-administration on chondrogenic gadolinium uptake and cytotoxicity
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Alexander Zimmerer, Frank Schulze, Sebastian Gebhardt, Katrin Huesker, Dirk Stobbe, Daniel Grolimund, Bernhard Hesse, Georgi I. Wassilew, Janosch Schoon
